title: Captive Fantasy
description: Seraphina Scala has just confessed she's never had an orgasm and now her friend has the perfect solution-a night spent at Captive Fantasy, a club that guarantees to fulfill every deep, dark, secret desire. Sera would rather admit she's a vampire than join her friend at such a place, but she doesn't, and she finds herself surrounded by ravenous women and drop-dead gorgeous men. One in particular steals her attention...
author: L. Rosario
